parameters.name: domainIdentifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the Amazon DataZone domain where the custom asset type is being created.

parameters.name: formsInput
parameters.description: The metadata forms that are to be attached to the custom asset type. (string) --- (dict) --- The details of the form entry. required (boolean) --- Specifies whether a form entry is required. The type ID of the form entry. The type revision of the form entry.

nested_params.name: required
nested_params.description: Specifies whether a form entry is required.

nested_params.name: typeIdentifier
nested_params.description: The type ID of the form entry.

nested_params.name: typeRevision
nested_params.description: The type revision of the form entry.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the custom asset type.

parameters.name: owningProjectIdentifier
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon DataZone project that is to own the custom asset type.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the asset type is to be created.

nested_items.name: createdBy
nested_items.description: The Amazon DataZone user who creates this custom asset type.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the custom asset type.

nested_items.name: domainId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon DataZone domain in which the asset type was created.

nested_items.name: formsOutput
nested_items.description: The metadata forms that are attached to the asset type.

nested_items.name: required
nested_items.description: Specifies whether a form entry is required.

nested_items.name: typeName
nested_items.description: The name of the type of the form entry.

nested_items.name: typeRevision
nested_items.description: The type revision of the form entry.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the asset type.

nested_items.name: originDomainId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon DataZone domain where the asset type was originally created.

nested_items.name: originProjectId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon DataZone project where the asset type was originally created.

nested_items.name: owningProjectId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon DataZone project that currently owns this asset type.

nested_items.name: revision
nested_items.description: The revision of the custom asset type.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the custom type was created.

nested_items.name: updatedBy
nested_items.description: The Amazon DataZone user that created the custom asset type.
